policies.name: Enable read access for all users
Users can delete own venture competitors
policies.qual:
(venture_id IN ( SELECT ventures.id
   FROM ventures
  WHERE (ventures.created_by = auth.uid())))

policies.name: Users can insert own venture competitors
policies.withCheck:
(venture_id IN ( SELECT ventures.id
   FROM ventures
  WHERE (ventures.created_by = auth.uid())))

policies.name: Users can update own venture competitors
policies.qual:
(venture_id IN ( SELECT ventures.id
   FROM ventures
  WHERE (ventures.created_by = auth.uid())))

policies.name: Users can view own venture competitors
policies.qual:
(venture_id IN ( SELECT ventures.id
   FROM ventures
  WHERE (ventures.created_by = auth.uid())))

policies.name: Allow read access to component patterns
Allow authenticated insert to design decisions
Allow read access to design decisions
Allow read access to feature areas
Allow read access to page routes
Allow read access to user workflows
Allow insert GitHub operations
policies.withCheck: ((sd_id IS NOT NULL) OR (prd_id IS NOT NULL))

policies.name: Allow read access to GitHub operations
Authenticated users can read kb generation log
Service role has full access to kb generation log
Authenticated users can read process scripts
Service role has full access to process scripts
Authenticated users can read schema constraints
Service role has full access to schema constraints
Allow authenticated users to delete nav_routes
Allow authenticated users to insert nav_routes
Allow authenticated users to read nav_routes
Allow authenticated users to update nav_routes
Enable read access for all users
Allow anon users to insert prd_research_audit_log
Allow anon users to select prd_research_audit_log
Allow authenticated users to read prd_research_audit_log
Allow all operations for anon users
Allow all operations for authenticated users
Allow read access to all users
Allow anon users to read system_health
Allow authenticated users to insert system_health
Allow authenticated users to read system_health
Allow service role to update system_health
Allow anon users to delete tech_stack_references
Allow anon users to insert tech_stack_references
Allow anon users to select tech_stack_references
Allow anon users to update tech_stack_references
Allow authenticated users to delete tech_stack_references
Allow authenticated users to read tech_stack_references
Allow authenticated users to update tech_stack_references
Anon users can view all uat_cases
Anon users can view all uat_defects
Anon users can view all uat_results
Anon users can view all uat_runs
Service role can manage test users
Company access venture_documents
policies.qual:
((venture_id IN ( SELECT v.id
   FROM ventures v
  WHERE (v.company_id IN ( SELECT user_company_access.company_id
           FROM user_company_access
          WHERE (user_company_access.user_id = auth.uid()))))) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM auth.users
  WHERE (users.id = auth.uid()))))

policies.name: Users can view own function calls
policies.qual:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM voice_conversations
  WHERE ((voice_conversations.id = voice_function_calls.conversation_id) AND (voice_conversations.user_id = auth.uid()))))

policies.name: Users can view own metrics
policies.qual:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM voice_conversations
  WHERE ((voice_conversations.id = voice_usage_metrics.conversation_id) AND (voice_conversations.user_id = auth.uid()))))
